channel.title: Comments on: Every journey is simply a series of steps

item.title: By: americandalek
item.dc:creator: americandalek
item.description: what about the constant crashing of the server when we all log in at once... can you please fix that?
item.content:encoded: what about the constant crashing of the server when we all log in at once… can you please fix that?

item.title: By: alex
item.dc:creator: alex
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/every-journey-is-simply-a-series-of-steps/#comment-17">Emily</a>.
Activate your account first (in your email), then you should be able to see the "Request Membership" button in most pages.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Emily.

Activate your account first (in your email), then you should be able to see the “Request Membership” button in most pages.

item.title: By: Emily
item.dc:creator: Emily
item.description:
Hi, I need help, I got a letter and it tells me to: 1) go to /commons/ 2)register for an ATDP Commons acount 3) search your class group 4)request membership
I did #1-3 and I can't figure out #4. There's no button or anything it just says to request membership and no instructions. I've looked everywhere!
Please help thanks! PS My class is 3133: The Internet Classroom
item.content:encoded:
Hi, I need help,
I got a letter and it tells me to:
1) go to /commons/
2)register for an ATDP Commons acount
3) search your class group
4)request membership

I did #1-3 and I can’t figure out #4.
There’s no button or anything it just says to request membership and no instructions. I’ve looked everywhere!

Please help thanks!
PS
My class is 3133: The Internet Classroom

item.title: By: Dev
item.dc:creator: Dev
item.description:
Haha, oh, I feel blessed to have previous hands send a blessing to this little experiment. I guess the cat's out of the bag with that Facebook post, and there's no going back now.
Regarding our database: the new 4D is ... the new 4D. We skipped a few versions and all of GSE is running off of the new v12 (see www.4d.com). I don't think there are any specific integration solutions, but there's nothing to stop us from tying the standard web forms we use now with this WP install. After this summer, that's just what I intend to do!
item.content:encoded:
Haha, oh, I feel blessed to have previous hands send a blessing to this little experiment. I guess the cat’s out of the bag with that Facebook post, and there’s no going back now.

Regarding our database: the new 4D is … the new 4D. We skipped a few versions and all of GSE is running off of the new v12 (see http://www.4d.com/). I don’t think there are any specific integration solutions, but there’s nothing to stop us from tying the standard web forms we use now with this WP install. After this summer, that’s just what I intend to do!

item.title: By: Candace
item.dc:creator: Candace
item.description:
Okay I have to ask: how did you replace the old 4D?? And can you link the new incarnation up with WordPress??? (Not idle curiosity--labouring under Blackboard at the moment!)
Thanks!
Candace (allowed to mess about with all things ATDP 1996-2002)
item.content:encoded:
Okay I have to ask: how did you replace the old 4D?? And can you link the new incarnation up with WordPress??? (Not idle curiosity–labouring under Blackboard at the moment!)

Thanks!

Candace (allowed to mess about with all things ATDP 1996-2002)

item.title: By: Lloyd
item.dc:creator: Lloyd
item.description: p.s.: and yeah, my "website" these days is my Twitter account... my online life has pretty much migrated there. I find using Twitter—and inscribing the moments of my days there—an apt representation of life as a whole. Fleeting, shareable in fragments, but the whole in time's due course revealing a mosaic through which hopefully a pattern appears, some meaning gleanable.
item.content:encoded: p.s.: and yeah, my “website” these days is my Twitter account… my online life has pretty much migrated there. I find using Twitter—and inscribing the moments of my days there—an apt representation of life as a whole. Fleeting, shareable in fragments, but the whole in time’s due course revealing a mosaic through which hopefully a pattern appears, some meaning gleanable.

item.title: By: Lloyd
item.dc:creator: Lloyd
item.description:
This is pretty awesome, Sam... and exciting! I look forward to continuing to interact with ATDP (and my former life ::chuckle::) via its Commons. And by the way, it has always been thus with TIC/TVA... using bleeding-edge software and web developments on-the-fly and just-in-time! You are certainly carrying on tradition here. :-)
And somehow I'm not surprised that you've ended up with WP (and not Drupal or Joomla or some other CMS). I've always liked WP, and I believe we even had an early instance of it installed in one of the servers years ago.
Best wishes for a splendid ATDP summer coming up.
aloha, L.
item.content:encoded:
This is pretty awesome, Sam… and exciting! I look forward to continuing to interact with ATDP (and my former life ::chuckle::) via its Commons. And by the way, it has always been thus with TIC/TVA… using bleeding-edge software and web developments on-the-fly and just-in-time! You are certainly carrying on tradition here. :-)

And somehow I’m not surprised that you’ve ended up with WP (and not Drupal or Joomla or some other CMS). I’ve always liked WP, and I believe we even had an early instance of it installed in one of the servers years ago.

Best wishes for a splendid ATDP summer coming up.

aloha,
L.

item.title: By: Stevie
item.dc:creator: Stevie
item.description: Yeah, I don't think I can edit comments. Booooo.
item.content:encoded: Yeah, I don’t think I can edit comments. Booooo.

item.title: By: Dev
item.dc:creator: Dev
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/every-journey-is-simply-a-series-of-steps/#comment-9">Stevie</a>.
I guess since we're officially open for business, sure. Go ahead and link away!
Edit: What weird capitalization? And did you know you can edit comments? ... or is that just me because I'm the admin? XD
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Stevie.

I guess since we’re officially open for business, sure. Go ahead and link away!

Edit: What weird capitalization? And did you know you can edit comments? … or is that just me because I’m the admin? XD
